name: Hauntorch
description: A spectral flame that burns with otherworldly fire. Its ghostly form allows it to phase through attacks while unleashing devastating bursts of spiritual energy.

ability.name: Phantom Flame
ability.description: 30% chance to avoid physical attacks completely. When avoiding, next Fire or Ghost move deals 50% more damage

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: Hurls a shadowy blob at the target. May lower the target's Sp. Defense.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The user shoots flames at the target. May cause burn.

moves.name: Phantom Strike
moves.description: Phases through defenses to strike. Always hits and ignores defensive boosts.

moves.name: Infernal Burst
moves.description: Unleashes all spiritual energy in a massive explosion. User loses 1/3 of max HP.
